about: Join Ammar, Nimish at our cybersecurity event focusing on CTF challenges and binary exploitation, and explore the depths of digital defense and offense.

about: ASoC is a program where you contribute to open source under the guidance of experienced mentors!

venue: Conf center, Faculty of technology, University of Delhi
about: ALiAS members attended the Pydelhi Conf'23 which is hosted annually by PyDelhi Community with an aim to promote Python programming language.
